Posts.Content: Jan 9, 2010 07:51AM NOTaStatistic wrote: I started Abraxane and Avastin three months ago for extensive bone and liver mets and I can honestly say I have NO side effects at all. My hair has thinned, but I am not bald. The Abraxane is three weeks on, one week off. The Avastin is once every two weeks. I also get Zometa monthly and take Arimidex. I feel GREAT. No more bone pain! I live in a state where cancer patients can legally obtain marijuana. I have benefited from this. This is my third round of IV chemo. I had Cyclphosphmide, Doxorubicin and Paclataxel four years ago. Then I had five months of Ixabepilone with Xeloda.On those drugs, I did experience mild nausea/vomiting and complete hair loss. I also had Xeloda by itself.
Posts.Title: Abraxane and Avastin Page1989 NOTaStatistic

Posts.Content: Dec 19, 2009 09:52AM - edited Dec 19, 2009 09:55AM by NOTaStatistic I was 38 (Stage IV). Mets to bones two years later. Mets to liver four years later.
